trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicHoverStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicHoverStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A> property to specify a light blue background color for the selected dynamic menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A>屬性來指定已選取動態功能表項目的淺藍色背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display at the top of each dynamic menu item to separate it from other menu items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在每個動態功能表項目頂端，以便與其他功能表項目隔開之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a separator image displayed at the top of each dynamic menu item.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個動態功能表項目頂端之分隔符號影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to specify an optional custom image to display at the top of each dynamic menu item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性可指定選擇性的自訂映像，以顯示每個動態功能表項目的頂端。

trans-unit.source: This image acts as a separator between menu items and is commonly an image of a line.
trans-unit.target: 此映像做為功能表項目之間的分隔符號，而且通常是一條線的映像。

trans-unit.source: You can also display a separator image at the bottom of each dynamic menu item by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以顯示在每個動態功能表項目底部分隔符號影像，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to display a separator image at the top of each dynamic menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A>分隔符號影像顯示在每個動態功能表項目頂端的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu vertically relative to its parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定讓動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目進行垂直移位的像素數。

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels to shift a dynamic menu vertically relative to its parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 讓動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目進行垂直移位的像素數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicVerticalOffset%2A> property to adjust the vertical position of a dynamic menu relative to its parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicVerticalOffset%2A>調整動態功能表相對於其父功能表項目垂直位置的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property affects the position of a dynamic menu differently depending on whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is displayed vertically or horizontally (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會影響以不同的方式取決於是否動態功能表的位置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>垂直或水平顯示控制項 (依指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the differences.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的差異。

trans-unit.source: Orientation
trans-unit.target: 方向

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Horizontal
trans-unit.target: 水平

trans-unit.source: By default, a dynamic menu is displayed directly below its parent menu item without any spacing in between.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，動態功能表會顯示其父功能表項目，沒有任何間距，兩者之間的正下方。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property controls the vertical spacing between the dynamic menu and its parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會控制 [動態] 功能表和其父功能表項目之間的垂直間距。

trans-unit.source: Vertical
trans-unit.target: 垂直

trans-unit.source: By default, a dynamic menu item is displayed next to its parent menu item with the top edges aligned.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，動態功能表項目是其父功能表項目旁顯示的上邊緣對齊。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property shifts the dynamic menu position vertically from this base position.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會讓動態功能表的位置從垂直這個基底的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to a negative value to shift a dynamic menu in a negative direction.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將這個屬性設為負值，讓動態功能表以負數方向。

trans-unit.source: If you are displaying a horizontal menu, a negative value causes a dynamic menu and its parent menu item to overlap.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要顯示水平的功能表，負值會導致動態功能表和其父功能表項目重疊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicVerticalOffset%2A> property to shift a dynamic menu down by 10 pixels from the top of its parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicVerticalOffset%2A>向下移動動態功能表 10 個像素會從其父功能表項目頂端的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the menu control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBind" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBind" /> 方法之前，請先確認功能表控制項是否需要資料繫結，而且是否已指定有效的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value path to the menu item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取之功能表項目的值路徑。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the menu item at the specified value path.
trans-unit.target: 擷取位於指定值路徑的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> that represents the menu item at the specified value path.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" />，代表位於指定值路徑的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.FindItem%2A> method to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.FindItem%2A>方法來擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object, you must specify a menu path to the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件，您必須指定功能表項目的功能表路徑。

trans-unit.source: The menu path is a string of delimited values that form the path from a root menu item to the current menu item.
trans-unit.target: 功能表路徑是形成根功能表項目從目前的功能表項目路徑的分隔值的字串。

trans-unit.source: To determine the delimiter character, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷分隔符號字元，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.FindItem%2A> method to retrieve a menu item from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control at a specified value path.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.FindItem%2A>方法來擷取功能表項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項的指定的值路徑。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the design-time state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項的設計階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項的設計階段狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.GetDesignModeState%2A> method is a helper method used to get the current design-time state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.GetDesignModeState%2A>方法是 helper 方法，用來取得目前的設計階段狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should render a block of cascading style sheet (CSS) definitions for the styles that are used in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 ASP.NET 是否應該針對功能表中使用的樣式，在階層式樣式表 (CSS) 定義中專門設立一個區塊。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether ASP.NET should render a block of CSS definitions for the styles that are used in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，表示 ASP.NET 是否應該針對功能表中使用的樣式，在 CSS 定義中專門設立一個區塊。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses CSS styles to control its appearance in a browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項使用的 CSS 樣式來控制它在瀏覽器的外觀。

trans-unit.source: By default, it renders a `style` element that contains the CSS definitions for the CSS classes that it uses.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，它會呈現`style`它會使用包含 CSS 定義的 CSS 類別的項目。

trans-unit.source: You typically set this property to `false` in the following situations:
trans-unit.target: 您通常將此屬性設定為`false`在下列情況：

trans-unit.source: You want to provide your own CSS definitions in order to customize the appearance of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 您想要提供您自己的 CSS 定義自訂功能表的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You must then provide your own block of CSS definitions in the page, or include a link to an external CSS file that contains the definitions.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您必須提供您自己的區塊的 CSS 定義在頁面中，或包含外部 CSS 檔案包含定義的連結。

trans-unit.source: You want to keep the default appearance but prefer to keep the generated CSS definitions in a separate file.
trans-unit.target: 您想要保留的預設外觀，但想要產生的 CSS 定義維持在個別的檔案。

trans-unit.source: You must then provide the file and link to it.
trans-unit.target: 您必須提供檔案，並在它的連結。

trans-unit.source: In either of these situations, you can get a copy of the default CSS block that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control generates by setting the property to `true`, running the page, and viewing the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，您可以取得一份預設 CSS 區塊，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項屬性設定為產生`true`、 執行頁面上，並在瀏覽器中檢視網頁。

trans-unit.source: You can then view the page source in the browser and copy and paste the CSS block into the page markup or into a separate file.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢視網頁原始檔中的瀏覽器和複本，並將 CSS 區塊貼入網頁標記的個別檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you set this property to `false`, you cannot set style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此屬性設定為`false`，您無法設定樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot add a `DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor` attribute in markup or set the `DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor` property in code.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您無法加入`DynamicHoverStyle-ForeColor`標記或集合中的屬性`DynamicHoverStyle.ForeColor`程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection" /> object that contains all menu items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection" /> 物件，這個物件含有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中所有的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection" /> that contains all menu items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中所有的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> property (collection) to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection> object that contains all the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>屬性 （集合），即可取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection>中的物件，其中包含所有功能表項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the menu items, or to access a specific menu item.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合通常用來快速地逐一查看所有功能表項目，或存取特定的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> collection can also be used to programmatically manage the menu items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>集合也可用來以程式設計方式管理功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> collection objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入、 插入、 移除及擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>集合物件。

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection will automatically be reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control after the next round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: 集合的任何更新會自動反映在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>往返到伺服器的下一步 後的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> collection to traverse the menu items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>集合周遊功能表中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text for menu items should wrap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示功能表項目的文字是否應換行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to wrap the menu item text; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示功能表項目文字應換行，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ItemWrap%2A> property to specify whether the text displayed in each menu item wraps.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ItemWrap%2A>屬性來指定是否顯示每個功能表項目中的文字換行。

trans-unit.source: When the text runs out of space, it is automatically split and continued on the following line.
trans-unit.target: 當文字用盡空間時，自動分割，並繼續到下一行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ItemWrap%2A> property to enable text wrapping in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ItemWrap%2A>屬性來啟用中的文字換行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> object that contains the style settings that are applied to menu items based on their level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> 物件，這個物件含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目層級，套用至功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> that contains the style settings that are applied to menu items based on their level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" />，含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目層級，套用至功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuItemStyle%2A>) to control the style of menu items at the individual levels of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>集合，做為個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicMenuItemStyle%2A>) 來控制在個別的功能表層級的功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The styles contained in this collection are applied to the menu items based on their menu level.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中包含的樣式會套用至功能表層級為基礎的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the first level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一個層級的功能表中功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of menu items in the second level of the menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至功能表上，等等的第二個層級中的功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的其中的功能表項目在特定層級應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。

trans-unit.source: If a style is defined for a certain level using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection, this overrides any menu item style settings for the menu items at that level.
trans-unit.target: 如果針對特定層級使用定義的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>任何功能表項目集合，這個覆寫樣式該層級的功能表項目的設定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection to apply style settings to the menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control based on their level.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>將樣式設定套用至功能表項目在集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項根據其層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> object that contains the style settings that are applied to the selected menu item based on its level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> 物件，這個物件含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目層級，套用至選取功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> that contains the style settings that are applied to the selected menu item based on its level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" />，含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目層級，套用至選取功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection as an alternative to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A> properties to control the style of a selected menu item at the individual levels of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>集合做為替代<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>屬性以控制選取的功能表項目在個別的功能表層級的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The styles contained in this collection are applied to a selected menu item based on its menu level.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中包含的樣式會套用至選取的功能表項目，根據其功能表層級。

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of a selected menu item in the first level of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至第一個層級的功能表中選取的功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of a selected menu item in the second level of the menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至選取的功能表項目的功能表和等等的第二個層級中的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的其中的功能表項目在特定層級應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。

trans-unit.source: If a style is defined for a certain level using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection, this overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A> properties at that level.
trans-unit.target: 如果針對特定層級使用定義的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>集合，則會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicSelectedStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>該層級的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection to apply a style setting to the selected menu item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control based on its level.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>將樣式設定套用至選取的功能表項目中的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項根據其層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> object that contains the style settings that are applied to the submenu items in the static menu based on their level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> 物件，這個物件含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的子功能表項目層級，套用至靜態功能表中子功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" /> that contains the style settings that are applied to the submenu items in the static menu based on their level in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyleCollection" />，含有根據 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的子功能表項目層級，套用至靜態功能表中子功能表項目的樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>) to control the style of the static submenu items displayed in the static menu at the individual levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>集合，做為個別的樣式屬性的替代方式 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>) 來控制顯示在個別的層級靜態功能表中的靜態子功能表項目樣式。

trans-unit.source: The styles contained in this collection are applied to the static submenu items based on their menu level.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合中包含的樣式會套用至靜態子功能表項目，根據員工的功能表層級。

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the first static submenu level displayed in the static menu.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一個樣式會對應至顯示在靜態功能表中的第一個靜態子功能表層級的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the second submenu level displayed in the static menu, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二個樣式會對應至第二個層級顯示在靜態功能表中，等等的子功能表的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This collection is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合是最常用來產生內容樣式導覽功能表的其中的功能表項目在特定層級應該具有相同的外觀，不論它們是否具有子功能表。

trans-unit.source: If a style is defined for a certain level using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection, this overrides any static submenu item style settings at that level.
trans-unit.target: 如果針對特定層級使用定義的樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>任何靜態子功能表項目集合，這個覆寫樣式該層級的設定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection to apply style settings to the submenu items displayed in the static menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control based on their level.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>將樣式設定套用至靜態功能表中顯示的子功能表項目集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項根據其層級。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control that need to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 載入 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中需要保存的屬性狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved view-state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，含有控制項的已儲存檢視狀態值。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要針對動態功能表呈現的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of menu levels to render for a dynamic menu.
trans-unit.target: 要針對動態功能表呈現的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 3。

trans-unit.source: You can display multiple menu levels in the static menu by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property to a value greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定靜態功能表中顯示多個功能表層級<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>屬性設為大於 1 的值。

trans-unit.source: You can also display additional levels in dynamic menus by setting this property to a value greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將這個屬性的值大於 0，來顯示在動態功能表中的其他層級。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you display two menu levels in the static menu (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property to 2) and then set this property to 3, three additional menu levels are displayed in dynamic menus.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您在靜態功能表中顯示兩個功能表層級 (藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>屬性 2) 然後將此屬性設定為 3，三個層級會顯示在動態功能表中的其他功能表。

trans-unit.source: All remaining higher menu levels (if any) are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 所有剩餘較高的功能表層級 （如果有的話） 會被捨棄。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to 0 displays a flat menu up to the level specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property, without any dynamic menus.
trans-unit.target: 將這個屬性設定為 0 就會顯示一般功能表到指定的層級<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>屬性，沒有任何動態功能表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels%2A> property to limit the number of menu levels to display in a dynamic menu to 1.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels%2A>屬性來限制在 1 動態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: Only the root menu level is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 只有根功能表層級會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels" /> property is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels" /> 屬性會設定為小於 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event is raised when a menu item is clicked in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>按一下中的功能表項目時，會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing with another control on the page, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，如這個事件發生時，在頁面上，另一個控制項與同步處理的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取的屬性引發事件的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event that displays the text of the menu item selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>顯示使用者所選取的功能表項目文字的事件。

trans-unit.source: Contains the command name.
trans-unit.target: 包含命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This read-only field contains the name of the command used to access menu items.
trans-unit.target: 這個唯讀欄位會包含用來存取功能表項目命令的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is "Click".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 「 按一下 」。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a menu item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目繫結至資料時發生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> event is raised when a menu item is bound to data in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>功能表項目中的資料繫結時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content or modifying a menu item before it is rendered, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如加入自訂內容或修改功能表項目之前呈現，只要就會發生此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs> object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to access the properties of the menu item that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理常式，可讓您存取的屬性引發事件的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> event that modifies the text of the `Home` menu item before it is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>修改文字的事件`Home`功能表項目之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control is passed up the page's user interface (UI) server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項的事件是否要在頁面的使用者介面 (UI) 伺服器控制項階層架構中向上傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已取消，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>繫結至資料時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知控制項執行與它相關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding%2A>方法允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: This method is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，由控制項開發人員通常使用這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnDataBinding(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 當通知由這個方法時，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。

trans-unit.source: In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated.
trans-unit.target: 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, you cannot access another server control when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子系或父這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemClick(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemDataBound>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnMenuItemDataBound(System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A>方法透過呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項引發<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: It is generally used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> class.
trans-unit.target: 擴充時，它通常會由控制項開發人員使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the direction in which to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項的呈現方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Orientation.Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Orientation.Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A> property to specify the direction in which to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A>屬性來指定用於轉譯方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available directions.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的方向。

trans-unit.source: Orientation
trans-unit.target: 方向

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is rendered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項的水平方式呈現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control is rendered vertically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>垂直顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A> property to display a horizontal menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Orientation%2A>屬性來顯示水平的功能表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to delimit the path of a menu item in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字元，用來分隔 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中功能表項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The character used to delimit the path of a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔功能表項目之路徑的字元。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a slash mark (/).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是斜線 （/）。

trans-unit.source: Each menu item (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object) in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ValuePath%2A> property that specifies the position of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: 每個功能表項目 (由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>物件) 中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ValuePath%2A>屬性，指定功能表項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The value path is a string of delimited values that form the path from a root menu item to the current menu item.
trans-unit.target: 值路徑是分隔的值可形成根功能表項目目前的功能表項目路徑的字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A> property to specify the delimiting character used to separate the values in the menu path.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A>屬性，以指定分隔字元用來分隔功能表路徑中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 這個值通常用於剖析為個別值的清單。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the text displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 根據中顯示的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項，以避免任何衝突變更，可能需要分隔符號字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ValuePath%2A> property cannot be parsed accurately.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定逗號分隔符號字元，所顯示的文字不應該包含任何逗號;否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.ValuePath%2A>屬性無法正確剖析。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A> property to change the delimiter character for a menu item's value path to a comma.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PathSeparator%2A>屬性，以逗點變更功能表項目的值路徑的分隔符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Binds the items from the data source to the menu items in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 將資料來源中的項目繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PerformDataBinding%2A> method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to bind the items in the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項繫結至資料來源中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，代表傳遞至事件處理常式的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Processes an event raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 處理當表單張貼至伺服器時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，代表用來將內容寫入 Web 網頁的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the menu control on the client browser.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端瀏覽器上呈現功能表控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含組建及呈現特定裝置輸出方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.
trans-unit.target: 加入標記屬性，並將控制項開頭標記 (Tag) 的標記 (Markup) 寫入至發出給瀏覽器或裝置的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A> method adds tag attributes and writes the markup for the opening tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the response stream for the client browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法加入標記屬性和控制項的開頭標記的標記寫入至發出給用戶端瀏覽器的回應資料流輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A> when you want to implement custom behavior, for example to write multiple tags to the response stream before any control content, such as `<table><tr><td>`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A>當您想要實作自訂行為，例如將多個標記寫任何之前，先在回應資料流控制內容，例如`<table><tr><td>`。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderBeginTag%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含組建及呈現特定裝置輸出方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This member overrides <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員會覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)" />。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> method to render the contents of the control between the begin and end tags.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>方法以呈現控制項的開始和結束標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method renders any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的預設實作會呈現任何子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含組建及呈現特定裝置輸出方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs final markup and writes the HTML closing tag of the control to the output stream emitted to the browser or device.
trans-unit.target: 執行最終標記 (Markup)，並將控制項的 HTML 結尾標記 (Tag) 寫入至發出給瀏覽器或裝置的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to render <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> submenus and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呈現<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>子功能表和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control renders HTML <see langword="table" /> elements and inline styles, or <see langword="listitem" /> elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項會呈現 HTML <see langword="table" /> 項目和內嵌樣式，還是會呈現 <see langword="listitem" /> 項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control renders HTML <see langword="table" /> elements and inline styles, or <see langword="listitem" /> elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項會呈現 HTML <see langword="table" /> 項目和內嵌樣式，還是會呈現 <see langword="listitem" /> 項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderingMode%2A> property determines how the menu control renders markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.RenderingMode%2A>屬性會決定功能表控制項的標記的呈現方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles to specify the appearance of the menu in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 3.5 和舊版中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項利用 HTML`table`項目和內嵌樣式，在瀏覽器中指定功能表的外觀。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 4 and later versions, by default the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses HTML `listitem` elements and cascading style sheet (CSS) styles.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 4 和更新版本中的，依預設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項利用 HTML`listitem`項目和階層式樣式表 (CSS) 樣式。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control renders markup that is appropriate to the ASP.NET version that is indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未設定這個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項呈現標記由所表示的 ASP.NET 版本適合<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses the following rules:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項會使用下列規則：

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property is `3.5`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses HTML `table` elements and inline styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>屬性是`3.5`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項利用 HTML`table`項目和內嵌樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property is `4.0` or greater, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control uses HTML `listitem` elements and CSS styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>屬性是`4.0`或更多，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項利用 HTML`listitem`項目和 CSS 樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會提供回溯相容性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property indicates that you want controls to generate HTML that is compatible with ASP.NET 4 or later, but you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control to be an exception that uses earlier behavior, you can set this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Table>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>屬性會指出您想要產生為相容於 ASP.NET 4 或更新版本的 HTML 控制項，但您想要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制要使用先前的行為的例外狀況，您可以將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Table>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a Web page that displays text from right to left you might want to set this property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Table> because some browsers do not display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.List> mode markup properly for right-to-left text.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您有 Web 網頁會顯示由右至左的文字，您可能想要將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.Table>因為某些瀏覽器不會顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuRenderingMode.List>模式標記正確地從右至左的文字。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the properties in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control that need to be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項中需要保存的屬性狀態。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含控制項的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: If there have been no changes to the state, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此狀態沒有任何變更，這個方法就會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來儲存中的屬性狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項需要保存，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SaveControlState%2A> method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SaveControlState%2A>方法而言是不可或缺的控制項的作業 （例如索引或關鍵字） 且為個別控制項的檢視狀態資料從狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用於主要由控制項開發人員擴充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在動態功能表中之影像的 URL，表示使用者可以向下捲動以檢視其他功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image displayed in a dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在動態功能表中之影像的 URL，表示使用者可以向下捲動以檢視其他功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET 4.0 轉譯模式中不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code:
trans-unit.target: 如果這是必要屬性，您可以將功能表.NET 3.5 呈現模式中網頁的程式碼中加入下列：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each dynamic menu to indicate that the user can scroll down for additional menu items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂映像底部的表示，使用者可以向下捲動其他功能表項目每個動態功能表顯示。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the internal, default image is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性未設定，內部會使用預設映像。

trans-unit.source: You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl%2A> property to display a custom image indicating that the user can scroll down in a dynamic menu for additional menu items.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl%2A>屬性來顯示使用者，可以動態功能表中的其他功能表項目向下捲動，指出自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text for the image specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl" /> 屬性中所指定影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text for the image specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownImageUrl" /> 屬性中所指定影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported in the .NET 4.0 rendering mode.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET 4.0 轉譯模式中不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is required, you can set the menu to the .NET 3.5 rendering mode by adding the following in the page's code:
trans-unit.target: 如果這是必要屬性，您可以將功能表.NET 3.5 呈現模式中網頁的程式碼中加入下列：

trans-unit.source: When a dynamic menu item contains additional items at the bottom of the menu, an image is displayed to indicate that the user can scroll down to view additional menu items.
trans-unit.target: 當動態功能表項目包含功能表底部的其他項目時，會顯示影像，表示使用者可以向上捲動到檢視其他功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for this image.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.ScrollDownText%2A>屬性來指定此映像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的映像的描述的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" /> that represents the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem" />，代表選取的功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A> property to determine the menu item selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A>屬性來判斷使用者選取功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: As a shortcut, you can also determine the text of the selected menu item directly by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 快速的方式，您也可以決定選取的功能表項目的文字是直接使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a menu item from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick> event is raised, which allows you to perform a custom routine by providing an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者選取功能表項目從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MenuItemClick>引發事件時，可讓您藉由提供的事件處理常式執行自訂的常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A> property to determine the selected menu item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A>屬性來判斷中的選取的功能表項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取功能表項目的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: 選取功能表項目的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that no menu item is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示目前未選取任何功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A> property as a shortcut to determine the text of the selected menu item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A>屬性來判斷選取的功能表項目文字的捷徑。

trans-unit.source: To access the other properties of the selected menu item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取選取的功能表項目中的其他屬性，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedItem%2A>屬性。
