trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定隱藏影像的替代文字，讓螢幕助讀程式讀取以提供略過連結清單的能力。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text of a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏影像的替代文字，讓螢幕助讀程式讀取以提供略過連結清單的能力。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過連結清單可以讀取屬性來指定隱藏影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden skip link image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供具有隱藏的描述的輔助技術裝置跳過可用來將控制項設為更容易存取的連結映像。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性做為螢幕助讀程式所要略過整個控制項的方式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性設定，呈現不可見的影像的替代文字，讓使用者選擇跳至控制項的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Screen readers read the alternate text aloud, and the image occupies only one pixel space.
trans-unit.target: 大聲閱讀，螢幕助讀程式讀取的替代文字和影像佔用一個像素的空間。

trans-unit.source: For pixel-precise control over the rendering of the page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property to an empty string ("") and provide your own mechanism to skip the menu.
trans-unit.target: 像素精確控制呈現頁面的詳細資訊，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>屬性設為空字串 ("")，並提供您自己的機制，以略過 功能表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property is set to the empty string by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>根據預設屬性設定為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A> property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the list of links.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SkipLinkText%2A>螢幕助讀程式，讓您略過連結清單可以讀取屬性來指定隱藏影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed as the separator at the bottom of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在每個靜態功能表項目底部，做為分隔符號之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image displayed as the separator at the bottom of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個靜態功能表項目底部，做為分隔符號之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image to display at the bottom of each static menu item that acts as a separator between menu items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂的映像，在每個靜態功能表的底部顯示項目，做為功能表項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also display a separator image at the top of each static menu item by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以顯示分隔符號影像上方的每個靜態功能表項目藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to specify a separator image to display at the bottom of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示在每個靜態功能表項目底部分隔符號影像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of menu levels to display in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在靜態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of menu levels to display in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 要在靜態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property to specify the number of menu levels to display in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>屬性來指定要在靜態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目。

trans-unit.source: All menu levels below the specified value are displayed in a dynamic menu.
trans-unit.target: 所有的功能表層級低於指定的值會顯示在動態功能表。

trans-unit.source: You can also limit the number of menu levels to display in a dynamic menu by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以限制以設定動態功能表中顯示的功能表層級數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.MaximumDynamicDisplayLevels%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property to display the first two menu levels in the static menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>靜態功能表中顯示的第一個的兩個功能表層級的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than 1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the built-in image is displayed to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否顯示內建影像以表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display the built-in image for static menu items with submenus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示顯示具有子功能表之靜態功能表項目的內建影像，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果靜態功能表項目含有子功能表，可以顯示一個影像，表示使用者可以展開功能表。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to display this image:
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可顯示此映像：

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property to `true` to use the built-in image (default).
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性`true`使用內建的映像 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property is set, that image overrides the built-in image, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性設定，則該影像會覆寫內建影像，不論值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property is set to `false`, no image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性未設定而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property to hide the image that indicates that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性隱藏表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property must also be set to an empty string ("") for the image to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性也必須設定為空字串 ("") 為隱藏，映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目上時，靜態功能表項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that represents the style of a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> 的參考，代表當滑鼠指標位於靜態功能表項目上時，靜態功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制靜態功能表項目的外觀，當滑鼠指標移至上方。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object (for example, `StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件 (例如， `StaticHoverStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticHoverStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 靜態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>集合或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A> property to change the background color of a static menu item to light sky blue when the user positions the mouse pointer over it.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>要將靜態功能表項目的背景色彩變更為淺 sky 藍色，當使用者將滑鼠指標進入此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional text shown with all menu items that are statically displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與靜態顯示之所有功能表項目一起顯示的其他文字。

trans-unit.source: The additional text or characters that appear with all menu items.
trans-unit.target: 與所有功能表項目一起顯示的其他文字或字元。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is "{0}."
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值是"{0}。 」

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to insert text to format static menu items in a menu.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來插入文字，以便設定功能表中的靜態功能表項目的格式。

trans-unit.source: This is particularly useful for mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 這是特別適用於行動裝置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control supports templates for the display of static and dynamic menu items, but templates are ignored on mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項支援的靜態和動態功能表項目，顯示範本，但是範本會忽略在行動裝置上。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to add characters or text and to apply formatting to menu items for both mobile and desktop devices without using a template.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您將字元或文字，並將格式套用至功能表項目，適用於行動和桌面裝置不使用範本。

trans-unit.source: To achieve consistent formatting when you use this property, you should also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicItemFormatString%2A> property if you want the formatting to be identical between the static and dynamic menu items.
trans-unit.target: 若要達到一致的格式使用這個屬性時，您也應該設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicItemFormatString%2A>屬性，如果您想要與相同的靜態和動態功能表項目之間的格式。

trans-unit.source: If both template formatting and this property are applied, the template formatting is ignored for mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果範本格式設定與此屬性會套用，範本的格式設定的行動裝置會忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticItemFormatString%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicItemFormatString%2A> properties to add text to each menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticItemFormatString%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DynamicItemFormatString%2A>屬性將文字加入每個功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that contains the custom content to render for a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣板，含有針對靜態功能表項目呈現的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" /> that contains the custom content for a static menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ITemplate" />，包含靜態功能表的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in rendering for a static menu, you can define your own user interface (UI) for a static menu item by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是針對靜態功能表中使用內建的轉譯，您可以定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，靜態功能表項目的使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticItemTemplate%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for a static menu item, first place `<StaticTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定靜態功能表項目的自訂範本，先將`<StaticTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<StaticTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<StaticTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: You can further control the style of a static menu by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以進一步控制靜態功能表的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the menu items in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可以讓您設定靜態功能表中功能表項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the menu items in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 的參考，代表靜態功能表中功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the menu items in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制靜態功能表中功能表項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object (for example, `StaticMenuItemStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件 (例如， `StaticMenuItemStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticMenuItemStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticMenuItemStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 靜態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>集合或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A> property to specify a light sky blue background color for the menu items in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>屬性來指定靜態功能表中功能表項目的淺色 sky 藍色背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓您設定動態功能表的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> that represents the style of a static menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 的參考，代表靜態功能表的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>屬性，即可控制靜態功能表的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object (for example, `StaticMenuStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件 (例如， `StaticMenuStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticMenuStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticMenuStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 靜態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>集合或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A> property to specify a light sky blue background color for the entire static menu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>屬性可指定整個靜態功能表的淺藍色 sky 背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternate text for the pop-out image used to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表之快顯影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The alternate text for the pop-out image.
trans-unit.target: 快顯影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果靜態功能表項目含有子功能表，可以顯示一個影像，表示使用者可以展開功能表。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A> property to specify the alternate text for this image.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A>屬性來指定此映像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to display the image:
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來顯示影像：

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property to `true` to use the built-in image (default).
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性`true`使用內建的映像 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: This property applies to both the built-in image and the custom image.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性適用於內建的映像和自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A> property to specify the alternate text for the image used to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A>屬性來指定用來表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表之影像的替代文字。

trans-unit.source: This text is displayed as a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over the image.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標停留在影像上時，此文字會顯示為工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示來表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image displayed to indicate that a static menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 顯示來表示靜態功能表項目具有子功能表之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When a static menu item contains a submenu, an image can be displayed to indicate that the user can expand the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果靜態功能表項目含有子功能表，可以顯示一個影像，表示使用者可以展開功能表。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to display this image:
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可顯示此映像：

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property to `true` to use the built-in image (default).
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性`true`使用內建的映像 （預設值）。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property is set, that image overrides the built-in image, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性設定，則該影像會覆寫內建影像，不論值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property is not set and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A> property is set to `false`, no image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性未設定而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticEnableDefaultPopOutImage%2A>屬性設定為`false`，不會顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, use a slash mark (/) instead of a backslash (\\).
trans-unit.target: 當您設定這個屬性時，使用斜線 （/），而不是反斜線 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: If you use backslashes in the path, the specified image will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在路徑中使用反斜線，不會顯示指定的映像。

trans-unit.source: You can specify alternate text for the image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定指定之影像的替代文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageTextFormatString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image to display in a static menu item when the menu item has a submenu.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticPopOutImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定功能表項目具有子功能表時，靜態功能表項目中顯示的自訂映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> object that allows you to set the appearance of the menu item selected by the user in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可以讓您設定使用者在靜態功能表中選取之功能表項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> that represents the style of the selected menu item in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle" /> 的參考，代表在靜態功能表中選取之功能表項目的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A> property to control the appearance of the menu item selected by the user in a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>屬性來控制使用者在靜態功能表中選取之功能表項目的外觀。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle> object (for example, `StaticSelectedStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以以宣告方式設定的屬性，在表單中`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemStyle>物件 (例如， `StaticSelectedStyle-ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `StaticSelectedStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `StaticSelectedStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Style properties for a static menu item are applied in the following order:
trans-unit.target: 靜態功能表項目的樣式屬性會套用順序如下：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticMenuItemStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A> collection or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelMenuItemStyles%2A>集合或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSubMenuStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other menu item style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.LevelSelectedStyles%2A>定義集合，它會套用在此階段中，覆寫的其他功能表項目的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticHoverStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Breaking change below.
trans-unit.target: 下列重大變更。

trans-unit.source: Before .NET Framework 4.0, when defining an `<asp:Menu>` control in the .aspx file, users can set the `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass` property to set the CSS class of the selected control item.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.0，當定義之前`<asp:Menu>`控制項在.aspx 檔案中，使用者可設定`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`屬性來設定選取的控制項項目之 CSS 類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, user may have a menu control as below:
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可能會有功能表控制項，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: And the menu control is rendered as:
trans-unit.target: 與此功能表控制項轉譯為：

trans-unit.source: However, in .NET Framework 4.0 and later, the selected menu item is set to the `selected` CSS class always instead of the class specified by `StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在.NET Framework 4.0 及更新版本中，選取的功能表項目會設定為`selected`CSS 類別，而所指定的類別不一定是`StaticSelectedStyle-CssClass`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the above ASP.NET code is rendered instead as:
trans-unit.target: 因此，上述的 ASP.NET 程式碼會改為轉譯成：

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A> property to specify a light blue background color for the selected static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSelectedStyle%2A>屬性來指定選取靜態功能表項目的淺藍色背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space, in pixels, to indent submenus within a static menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要讓子功能表在靜態功能表內縮排的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> that represents the amount of space, in pixels, to indent submenus within a static menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" />，代表要讓子功能表在靜態功能表內縮排的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: When the static menu displays more than one menu level (if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A> property is set to a value higher than 1), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSubMenuIndent%2A> property to specify the number of pixels by which to indent the submenu items within the static menu.
trans-unit.target: 當靜態功能表就會顯示一個以上的功能表層級 (如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticDisplayLevels%2A>屬性設定為高於 1 的值)，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSubMenuIndent%2A>屬性來指定所要的子功能表項目，靜態功能表內縮排的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSubMenuIndent%2A> property to indent the submenu items in a static menu by 10 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticSubMenuIndent%2A>10 個像素的縮排在靜態功能表中的子功能表項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 所選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit" /> 的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image displayed as the separator at the top of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在每個靜態功能表項目頂端，做為分隔符號之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL to an image displayed as the separator at the top of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 顯示在每個靜態功能表項目頂端，做為分隔符號之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to specify a custom image to display at the top of each static menu item that acts as a separator between menu items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定自訂映像以顯示每個靜態功能表頂端的項目，做為功能表項目之間的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also display a separator image at the bottom of each static menu item by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以顯示分隔符號影像的每個靜態功能表項目底部藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticBottomSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A> property to specify a separator image to display at the top of each static menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.StaticTopSeparatorImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要顯示在每個靜態功能表項目頂端分隔符號影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，代表傳遞至事件處理常式的事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Processes an event raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 處理當表單張貼至伺服器時引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> value that corresponds to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回 <see langword="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.TagKey%2A> property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> value that is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.TagKey%2A>屬性來判斷<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag>相關聯的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示與功能表項目關聯之 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.
trans-unit.target: 在其中顯示連結 Web 網頁內容的目標視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A> property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A>屬性，以指定的視窗或框架，以顯示 Web 內容會連結至功能表項目，按一下該功能表項目時。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 除了以底線為開頭的某些特殊值以外，值必須以 A 到 Z (不區分大小寫) 範圍內的字母為開頭，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Target value
trans-unit.target: 目標值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: 在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: 在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Internet Explorer versions 5.0 and above support the `_search` target value
trans-unit.target: 例如，Internet Explorer 版本 5.0 和更新版本支援`_search`目標值

trans-unit.source: This property applies to all menu items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會套用至所有功能表項目在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can selectively override this property by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> object directly.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地覆寫這個屬性設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A>每個屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>直接物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A> property renders as a target attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A>屬性轉譯成目標屬性。

trans-unit.source: The target attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition.
trans-unit.target: XHTML 1.1 嚴格的文件類型定義中不允許錨定項目上的目標屬性。

trans-unit.source: If rendered output must conform to XHTML or accessibility standards, do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果轉譯的輸出必須符合 XHTML 或協助工具標準，請勿設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Target%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A> property to specify that the content linked to each menu item should be displayed in a new window when the user clicks that menu item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Target%2A>屬性來指定內容連結至每個功能表項目應該顯示在新視窗中，當使用者按一下該功能表項目。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> control so they can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu" /> 控制項的檢視狀態變更，以便可將其儲存在該控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。
